name: com.uxvirtual.xri-canvas-haptics
description: Package for Unity XR Interaction Toolkit v3.x which enables haptics actuation for Unity canvas IPointer UI events via the SimpleHapticFeedback script.

samples.description: Demonstrates usage of the package with Unity XRI starter assets. Requires the XR Interaction Toolkit 3.x Starter Assets sample to be imported into the project.

author: UXVirtual (https://uxvirtual.com)
